wikipedia_page.main: Major General Sir Allan Henry Shafto Adair, 6th Baronet,  (3 November 1897 – 4 August 1988) was a senior officer of the British Army who served in both World wars; as a company commander in the Grenadier Guards in the First World War, and as General Officer Commanding of the Guards Armoured Division in the Second World War.

response: *Major–General Sir Allan Adair, 6th Baronet (1897–1988), Colonel of the Grenadier Guards (1961–1974)Harrow, 1800–1911, p. 894
